body: Any chance you can provide a sample we can use to reproduce the problem?

```
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
at io.quarkus.gradle.dependency.ConditionalDependenciesEnabler.lambda$createConditionalDependenciesConfiguration$1(ConditionalDependenciesEnabler.java:183)
```
this looks puzzling. FYI @reaver585

Well this does sound like it's my doing. Apologies.
I will look into that today.

This is a really odd one. NPE at [ConditionalDependenciesEnabler.java:183](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/3.24.2/devtools/gradle/gradle-model/src/main/java/io/quarkus/gradle/dependency/ConditionalDependenciesEnabler.java#L183) suggests that
```
183 // conditionalDepConfiguration.exclude(Map.of(
184 //                     "group", rule.getGroup(),
185 //                     "module", rule.getModule()))
```
`conditionalDepConfiguration` is null, but that really shouldn't be the case since nowhere in Gradle docs can I find a mention that `project.getConfigurations().detachedConfiguration()` may return null.

Additionally, I just tried with a fresh project using 3.24.2 and added some exclusions - I can't seem to reproduce the issue.
@fedork if you can't supply a reproducer, could you perhaps share your `build.gradle` file?

issue.title: Fix a NPE in ConditionalDependenciesEnabler

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

issue.body: Fixes #48739. A NPE occurred when trying to write a null value into an immutable map.
